name: cyren
label: Cyren
description: Cyren is leading a revolution in internet security by utilizing extensive cloud intelligence to provide the fastest protection available. This connector sends the URL Submitted by the End User to Cyren for web threats like phishing and malware.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: URL of the Cyren connector to access the connector website.
fields.tooltip: URL of the Cyren connector to access the connector website.

fields.title: JWToken
fields.name: token
fields.description: Provide a JSON Web Token (JWT), used for user authentication.
fields.tooltip: Provide a JSON Web Token (JWT), used for user authentication.

fields.title: Select Bundle Type
fields.name: select_bundle_type
fields.description: Select the bundle type to proceed with the api execution.
fields.tooltip: Select the bundle type to proceed with the api execution.

operations.title: Get URL Lookup
operations.description: Provide the categories assigned to a single URL.

parameters.title: Input Type
parameters.name: input_type
parameters.description: Select the url type that is how you want to provide the url or urls.
parameters.tooltip: Select the url type that is how you want to provide the url or urls.

parameters.name: value
parameters.title: Lookup URL
parameters.description: URL for which you want to fetch the categories assigned for.
